participant_1.background:
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
i am a father.

participant_2.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

content.text: Hi, I'm going through a divorce. I'm trying to figure out how to cope
I'm sorry to hear that. I've been divorced too. It's rough, but you can get through it
Thanks. I'm trying to keep my mind off of it. I've been spending a lot of time with my kids
That's good. Kids are a great distraction. I like to watch UFC fights when I'm feeling stressed
I like watching them too. I think it's cool how they can take a beating and keep going
I know, right? It's amazing what the human body can endure
My therapist doesn't really understand me. He thinks I'm crazy because I think I'm the main character in my own story
I don't think that's crazy at all. We all see the world through our own eyes. We're all the main characters in our own stories
Thanks. That's nice to hear. I'm glad I met you. You seem really understanding
Thanks. You seem nice too. I'm glad I met you to
